song.title: Shamaani
song.info:
the author's text from mod file's sample comments: "kaukana pohjoisessa, sivistyksen sormien ulottumattomissa elelee heimonsa viimeinen henkimaailman rumpali - shamaani - inarin mahtava noita. aina kun suljen silmani, n√§en nuo tunturit vanhoina, mutta arvokkaina ja nuo kirkkauden ja suuruuden verhoamat kadet kurkottamassa kohden taivasta..."
translation: "Far away in the north, to where the fingers of civilization do not reach, lives the last drummer of his tribe's spirit world - the shaman - the great witch of Inari. Always when I close my eyes, I see those fells as old but dignified and those hands veiled by brightness and greatness reaching to the sky..."
